short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly adjust ticket types with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Optimize Your Ticket Triaging Experience

Ever felt overwhelmed by the ticket triaging process? The iFetch Chrome extension is your solution. No more guesswork, no more errors. Nail the perfect Ticket Type, Component, and Labels combo instantly.

Key Features:

✅ Precision Triaging: Ensure every ticket triaged has the right Ticket Type, Component, and Labels.
✅Auto-Commenting: Tickets automatically get a "cs-type" comment for clarity.
✅ Automatic Re-queuing: "Accepted" tickets are automatically placed back into the queue once triaged.
✅ Streamlined Process: Simplify and speed up your ticket management.
✅ Intuitive Interface: User-friendly design makes triaging a breeze.

Install iFetch today and pave the way to a more streamlined and efficient ticket triaging process.
